channel.title: Comments on: Looking for a UKLUG venue

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>How about the Law Society's headquarters at Chancery lane. I know that they have venue hire facilities (although I have no idea of capacities) and the rooms are v posh:<br/><br /><br/><br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.lawsociety.org.uk/productsandservices/venuehire.law"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.lawsociety.org.uk/productsandservices/venuehire.law"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }</p>
item.content:encoded:
How about the Law Society’s headquarters at Chancery lane. I know that they have venue hire facilities (although I have no idea of capacities) and the rooms are v posh:

{ http://www.lawsociety.org.uk/productsandservices/venuehire.law“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link }

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Actually. my house is an option bar the geographical distance - 500 miles - from London and the sheer force of will required to get folks to visit rural scotland.<br /><br />Our village has a huge village hall and a pub, and we've been doing marquee tents for the raft races for years. So yeah. All do-able, if a little agricultural. For instance, Wifi might be an issue, given the lack of power in a tent.. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
Actually. my house is an option bar the geographical distance – 500 miles – from London and the sheer force of will required to get folks to visit rural scotland.

Our village has a huge village hall and a pub, and we’ve been doing marquee tents for the raft races for years. So yeah. All do-able, if a little agricultural. For instance, Wifi might be an issue, given the lack of power in a tent.. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

—* Bill

item.title: By: Turtle
item.dc:creator: Turtle
item.description: <p>I guess Wild Bill's house isn't an option...</p>
item.content:encoded: I guess Wild Bill’s house isn’t an option…
